member.name: ID2D1Device3.CreateDeviceContext
member.summary: Creates a new from this Direct2D device.
member.param: The options to be applied to the created device context.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the new device context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device3
member.summary: Represents a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together. This interface performs all the same functions as the interface. It also enables the creation of objects.
